text: 40. If a new influenza pandemic were to occur, would you want to use antiviral drugs? ‫ؠ‬ Certainly ‫ؠ‬ Probably ‫ؠ‬ Probably not ‫ؠ‬ Certainly not ‫ؠ‬ I don't know 42. Also, certain professionals (e.g. firefighters and the police) are also more susceptible to infection. As a result, the government has decided to give these people priority access to antiviral drugs. Do you think this is justified?
